Pre-Game Insights: Both teams need a win and must secure all three points to create a chance of making it into the knockout stages.
Hassan Maatouk did not have a lot of opportunities to score against Qatar but the situation will be different against China.
Yang Liu dominated the left flank and won nine out of 12 duels in the match against Tajikistan.
Lebanon have scored more than one goal in only one of their last five matches.
Lebanon (107) are the lowest-ranked team in Group A.
China are winless in their last three matches.
Lebanon wins – 0, China wins – 5, Draws – 1 in their head-to-head matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Kick-off on Wednesday, 17 January 2024, 5:00 PM IST (11:30 GMT) at the Al Thumama Stadium in Doha, Qatar.
